awd_titl_txt: US -Australia Cooperative Research: A Functional Approach   to Strong Coupling in QED & QCD
awd_abstract_narration: In this collaboration, Dr. Herbert Fried, of                                    the Brown University Department of Physics,                                     will work with Dr. Brian McKellar at the                                        Department of Physics of the University of                                      Melbourne, Australia, on problems associated                                    with the definition of the infrared                                             approximation in Quantum Chromodynamics, in a                                   non-perturbative formalism containing both                                      quarks and gluons, and the binding structure                                    of quark-antiquark and three-quark states.                                                                                                                      Current techniques and theory cannot be                                         applied to large-scale structure.  The U.S.                                     PI has recently defined new methods to                                          approach the problem and would collaborate                                      with Australia's leading expert in this                                         field.  The results may enhance our                                             understanding of the fundamental structure                                      and behavior of matter.
org_div_long_name: Office of International Science and Engineering
